plot outline: A young revolutionary rejects the future his parents chose for him and travels to Delhi to forge his own life and according to his own ideals. His quest to find a job that does not entail him to do any unjust work or tolerate any societal ill lands him the literal and metaphorical Kingdom of Hunger. This is his fight against hunger and society itself.
